room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson's Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: If you have not done this before - you really should. Its a super fun distraction to the mundane and allows you to escape and to escape...

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson's Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: An excellent time, lots of family fun!!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson's Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: We came in as a small group but we had Blast. Our host Josue did an amazing job. He was friendly and helpful. We finished in the nick of time but that was because we were too stubborn to use our hints.He's added to our experience and was a great asset to our night. I would def come back to do it all over again.
